name: startpage
description: Overrides the browsers newtab page with a custom startpage.

scripts.build-base: npm run clean && mkdir build/ && cp -r src/* build/
scripts.patch-ch: patch build/index.html < patch/index-html-chrome.diff && patch build/manifest.json < patch/manifest-json-chrome.diff
scripts.build-ch: npm run build-base && npm run polyf-ch && npm run patch-ch && ./zip.sh 'chrome'
